tool_description: Classify text into one of 7 emotions: anger 🤬, disgust 🤢, fear 😨, joy 😀, neutral 😐, sadness 😭, and surprise 😲.
name: Emotion Recognition
title: Emotion Recognition

api_list.name: Emotion Recognition
api_list.description: Classify emotions in English text data. Powered by AI.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emotion-recognition1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emotion-recognition1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://emotion-recognition1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emotion-recognition1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
